Welcome to Martian Weather’s documentation!¶

main.get_data_from_url(base_url)[source]¶

(str) -> str Return the data, got with url, in json-format.

main.make_day_table(n)[source]¶

(int) -> Figure Return a table with data for the n-th day of the week.

main.make_trace_graph(data, name)[source]¶

(int) -> Figure Return a line graph with the data for all the days of the week.

main.make_wind_rose(n)[source]¶

(int) -> Figure Return a wind rose for the n-th day of the week.

main.render_content(tab)[source]¶

(str) -> Figure Render a day table and a wind rose for the tab.

class adt_weather_data.WeatherData(data)[source]¶

Class for weather data container representation.

av_pres()[source]¶

(WeatherData) -> List Return list with average pressure of the week.

av_speed()[source]¶

(WeatherData) -> List Return list with average wind speed of the week.

av_temp()[source]¶

(WeatherData) -> List Return list with average temperatures of the week.

day(n)[source]¶

(WeatherData, int) -> List Return a list with information about the day. (sol, average temperature, pressure, wind speed)

days_list()[source]¶

(WeatherData) -> List Return a list with sols (days) numbers.

extract_data()[source]¶

(WeatherData) -> NoneType Extract data from the json and place it in the container.

max_pres()[source]¶

(WeatherData) -> List Return list with maximum pressure of the week.

max_speed()[source]¶

(WeatherData) -> List Return list with maximum wind speed of the week.

max_temp()[source]¶

(WeatherData) -> List Return list with maximum temperatures of the week.

min_pres()[source]¶

(WeatherData) -> List Return list with minimum pressure of the week.

min_speed()[source]¶

(WeatherData) -> List Return list with minimum wind speed of the week.

min_temp()[source]¶

(WeatherData) -> List Return list with minimum temperatures of the week.

season(n)[source]¶

(WeatherData, int) -> str Return season corresponding to the day.

wind_rose(n)[source]¶

(WeatherData, int) -> LinkedList Return linked list with data for n-th day wind rose.

class list.List(size)[source]¶

Class for list/array representation.

add(item)[source]¶

(List, object) -> NoneType Add an item to a first free place in the list, if there is one.

clear(value)[source]¶

(List, object) -> NoneType Set all the entries to the value.

class linked_list.LinkedList(item)[source]¶

Class for linked list representation.

add(item)[source]¶

Add an item to the linked list.

head()[source]¶

Return the head of the linked list.

class linked_list.LinkedListNode(item)[source]¶

Class for linked list node representation.

class multi_linked_list.DoubleMLinkedList(item)[source]¶

Class for double linked list representation.

add_one_way(item)[source]¶

Add an item the one way of the double linked list.

add_second_way(item)[source]¶

Add an item the second way of the double linked list.

head()[source]¶

Return head of the double linked list.

class multi_linked_list.TripleMLinkedList(item)[source]¶

Class for triple linked list representation.

add_one_way(item)[source]¶

Add an item the one way of the triple linked list.

add_second_way(item)[source]¶

Add an item the second way of the triple linked list.

add_third_way(item)[source]¶

Add an item the third way of the triple linked list.

head()[source]¶

Return head of the triple linked list.
